careers.title: Process Operator (Chemicals)
careers.whyThis: Process Operator (Chemicals) uses the Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences you’ve already been learning. To move towards Process Operator (Chemicals) you still need inquiry skills like evaluating. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Process Operator (Chemicals) involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Process Operator (Chemicals) now and understand what to work towards.
